comments:
Description:
UserException when view attached smoke design file after deploy birt in Tomcat4.1.31

Steps to reproduce:
1. Repeat steps in bug #121990.
2. view attached design file

Result:
Exception in:
soapenv:Server.userException

java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

See the attachment. I can view it with problem.

Check the WEB-INF/lib dir see if there is a "scriptapi.jar" there. This issue happned before 12/22.

Get this exception too.
